description: The number of the resolution. Example: 156
The filename of the extracted TXT file.
The official UN symbol of the resolution. Example: S/RES/2316 (2016)
The adoption date of the resolution in the format YYYY-MM-DD (ISO 8601). Example: 2016-11-09
The English text of the resolution. Up to resolution 899 this is revised OCR text, later resolutions are assumed to be born-digital and the text is extracted from the PDF file as-is.

The Arabic text of the resolution. Up to resolution 899 this is non-revised OCR text, later texts are assumed to be born-digital and the text is extracted from the PDF file as-is. Warning: non-revised OCR text may contain errors and superfluous text from other documents if they were printed on the same page.

The Spanish text of the resolution. Up to resolution 899 this is non-revised OCR text, later texts are assumed to be born-digital and the text is extracted from the PDF file as-is. Warning: non-revised OCR text may contain errors and superfluous text from other documents if they were printed on the same page.

The French text of the resolution. Up to resolution 899 this is non-revised OCR text, later texts are assumed to be born-digital and the text is extracted from the PDF file as-is. Warning: non-revised OCR text may contain errors and superfluous text from other documents if they were printed on the same page.

The Russian text of the resolution. Up to resolution 899 this is non-revised OCR text, later texts are assumed to be born-digital and the text is extracted from the PDF file as-is. Warning: non-revised OCR text may contain errors and superfluous text from other documents if they were printed on the same page.

The Chinese text of the resolution. Up to resolution 899 this is non-revised OCR text, later texts are assumed to be born-digital and the text is extracted from the PDF file as-is. Warning: non-revised OCR text may contain errors and superfluous text from other documents if they were printed on the same page.

The English text of the draft resolution. Up to resolution 899 this is non-revised OCR text, later texts are assumed to be born-digital and the text is extracted from the PDF file as-is. Warning: non-revised OCR text may contain errors and superfluous text from other documents if they were printed on the same page.

The English text of the meeting record. Up to resolution 899 this is non-revised OCR text, later texts are assumed to be born-digital and the text is extracted from the PDF file as-is. Warning: non-revised OCR text may contain errors and superfluous text from other documents if they were printed on the same page.
The body issuing the document. In the main data set this is always the UN Security Council (\enquote{S}), in the network data this may also be the UN General Assembly (\enquote{A}).
The type of the main document. In this data set always \enquote{RES}.
The adoption year of the resolution in the format YYYY (ISO 8601). Example: 2016
A human-curated summary, curated by the UN Digital Library.
Additional notes on the resolution, curated by the UN Digital Library.
The official UN symbol of the draft. Example: S/2023/102
The full name of an instrument annexed to a resolution, otherwise \enquote{NA}. Example: Statute of the International Tribunal for Rwanda (1994)
Whether the string “Chapter VII” is present in the text of the resolution. This would mean that the Council is acting under Chapter VII.
Number of pages of the English version of the document. Sourced from UN Digital Library.
The license for the data set. In this data set it is always Creative Commons Zero 1.0 Universal. Useful when merging individual rows with other data sets.
